Windlord/Elita:

Windlord shocked his head and he said "Be carefull, sir... I have the 
feeling that Hydras try to lure you or sort... just be carefull"

Elita stopped to cry and nuzzling against her daddy and huged him 
with her little paws. After a while she smiled and giggled



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: No, Windlord. Nothing has happened in general, 
except Hydras contacted me. He was only trying to put me on edge.
> 
> Elita's crib signals Rodimus. He heads to his quarters, picking up 
his daughter.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: You're awake. Enjoy your nap?
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> Windlord opened again his com link to Rodimus and said "Sir had 
> happen something while we were outside????"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord::
> > 
> > "Anything happened while we're outside????" asked the male
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Yggdrasil: Just as Windlord says. I'll brief you more 
thouroughly 
> > when
> > > I get back. The main thing is that everything's secure down at 
> the 
> > Ark.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> 
wrote:
> > > > Windlord:
> > > > 
> > > > Windlord opened his com link and said "Windlord to Rodimus, 
> > Ydrassil 
> > > > and I are leaving the Ark and going to base, Kup are 
remaining 
> > there 
> > > > with the bots that are custodied it... all seems be under 
> control"
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus Prime(via comm): That would be useful in the 
future, 
> > but 
> > > > it's to soon to send another spy into the Predacon ranks. 
They 
> > will 
> > > > be on the lookout for that. I do have a mission for you 
though. 
> > > > Battera was returning from her spy job when she dropped off 
the 
> > > > sensors. Find her last know location from the sensor logs and 
> go 
> > > > search for her. I wont have any Maximals MIA.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Rattrap "i know we lost one of our spies.i could become a 
spy 
> > > > again. that is if you agrre with me.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus sounds rather agitated when he answers the commlink.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus Prime(via comm): I'm in my office. You can speak 
with 
> > me 
> > > > here, Rattrap.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > lordofdarkness11001 <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Rattrap (over comm): " rodimus i need to speak to you."
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Rodimsu winces at the sounds of his beloved being 
tortured. 
> > And 
> > > > he 
> > > > > hears her Predacon designation, Blackstorm. He despised it. 
> > They 
> > > > had 
> > > > > violated Nightlight, his wife, in a way never thought 
> possible, 
> > her 
> > > > > very identity.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > As the comm channel closes, the screen switches to black 
> and 
> > then 
> > > > > shows the Maximal insignia.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Rodimus slumps back into his chair.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He had to get Nightlight back. Mostly for his daughter. 
> Elita 
> > > > > needed her mother.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Jeff <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > :: Hydras ::
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > A cruel grin creeped across Hydras face as he listened 
> > intently 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > the audio synth that Maxima had made. He clenched his 
right 
> > fist 
> > > > > > with eagerness; he wanted to do it again. 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Rodimus, know this: Nigh--" He stops cracking another 
> > evilish 
> > > > > > grin, "Blackstorm is of no consequence. Whether she lives 
> or 
> > dies 
> > > > > > matters not. Your eminent destruction comes, preparing 
for 
> it 
> > > > will 
> > > > > > only further your suffering. Hydras out." As he closes 
the 
> > comm 
> > > > > > line, a deep laugh rumbles from Hydras.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Well done Maxima." He places his hand on her 
> shoulder. "Now 
> > we 
> > > > > must 
> > > > > > plan to use Blackstorm to lure Rodimus out so we can 
> destroy 
> > him."
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > > > > > > Maximadid as was asked, without question or looking at 
> > Hydras. 
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Touching a few buttons, then within a second was 
> > Nightlight's 
> > > > > > voice & some 
> > > > > > > torturing moments. Not screams much, but some slight 
> > noticing 
> > > > > > moments of pain... 
> > > > > > > as well as the moment she was reprogrammed into 
> > Blackstorm... & 
> > > > > > Perceptor's 
> > > > > > > little informative reprogramming of who she was. & her 
> > > > > > acknowledgement of she 
> > > > > > > being Blackstorm & no longer Nightlight. There was no 
> > mention.. 
> > > > > of 
> > > > > > Nightlight. 
> > > > > > > Just... Blackstorm. 
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Her crimson optics glanced up to Rodimus & a wicked 
smirk 
> > > > cracked 
> > > > > > her face. 
> > > > > > > Oh, she was enjoying this. The more torture for him, 
the 
> > better.
> > > > > >
